meta.description: In this episode, Whitney is joined by Moscow-based journalist Riley Waggaman to explore the oligarchs and bankers behind Russia's Sputnik V Covid-19 vaccine and their ties to the dystopian rollout of Digital ID and CBDCs in the country.

title: Russia’s Sputnik V and the WEF with Riley Waggaman
cleaned_text:
AI and the War on Agriculture with Christian Westbrook

In this episode, Whitney is joined by Christian Westbrook of the Ice Age Farmer broadcast to discuss the underreported yet massive supply chain crisis and how the Davos elite plan to capitalize on that chaos to usher in AI-driven supply chains, especially as it relates agriculture. Originally published April 28, 2021 on Rokfin
